name: packaging production for liquid fertiliser or pesticide, per kilogram of packed product | packaging, for fertilisers or pesticides | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/15582/documentation

This dataset represents the production and disposal of packaging material needed to pack 1 kg of liquid fertilisers or pesticides used at the farm. ;1.160 kg of plastic is needed for a 20 liter container of liquid pesticides or fertiliser (mesured data, Agroscope).

This activity starts with the production of the plastic container for packaging liquid fertilisers or pesticides.

Included processes: Production of HDPE and injection moulding into plastic container for packing liquid fertiliser or pesticide. This activity ends with the disposal of waste packaging.
category: C:Manufacturing/22:Manufacture of rubber and plastics products/222:Manufacture of plastics products/2220:Manufacture of plastics products

exchanges.description: The reference product represents the production of the packaging material that is needed to store 1 kg of liquid pesticides (or fertilisers) in a 20 liter plastic container.

flow.name: packaging, for fertilisers or pesticides
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/22:Manufacture of rubber and plastics products/222:Manufacture of plastics products/2220:Manufacture of plastics products

exchanges.description: A plastic container to store 20 liter of liquide pesticides (or fertilisers) weights 1.160 kg (mesured data) which is 0.0058 kg packaging per kg stored liquor. The injection moulding process requiers 0.0583501 kg of HDPE since 1.0 kg product of this process equals 0.994 kg of injection moulded plastics.
